< index

Casa DT

architecture / Bologna, Italy / 2019

  21. Client: undisclosed Value: 70.000 euros Status: Completed

    Design of a family apartment. The house now revolves around a large, very blue and very multifunctional piece of furniture that separates the living area of the house from the sleeping side. Part kitchen, part walk-in closet, part storage, it is structure just as much as it is furniture. The rest is custom ligh fittings, a concrete-clad bathroom and some simple, white furniture.
